ingredients.content: 40 g sun-dried tomatoes in oil, drained
140 g red peppers, deseeded and quartered
150 g carrots, cut in pieces (2 cm)
100 g celery stalks, cut in pieces (2 cm)

preparations.content: Place all ingredients except noodles in mixing bowl and blend <b>20 sec/speed 7<b>. Scrape down sides and lid of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add kelp noodles to sauce and mix <b>30 sec//speed 3<b> stirring with spatula through hole in mixing bowl lid.
